vsParam: Cresson

Puff... Puff...
Hey, guys! Are you all right!?
Sorel

It's... It's a lot of work...
They didn't decrease, instead, they are increasing!
Anis Hyssop

Almost done... Ah!?
There are monsters behind us too!
Peppermint

Oh my gosh... We... We're surrounded!?
Now they cut us off from Ruhuna Village!
Cresson

Hmm, we have to fight our way out!
Guys, follow behind me...
Cresson
What!?
Hya!!
Cresson

Im... Impressive! What's that move!?
You took down the monster with a single strike...

Back up!
I'll take care of them here!
Phew... All the monsters are killed.
Sorel

He... He got rid of all those monsters in a flash...
He doesn't belong to the Guard or the Chivalric Order, who is he...

Me?
Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet.
Sterk

I'm Sterkenburg, a knight from "Arland Kingdom".
It's a bit hard to pronounce, so just call me Sterk.
Peppermint

Sterk, right? I'm Peppermint!
This is [px]!
Cresson

Thanks for your help, Sterk!
But where is Arland?
Anis Hyssop

I have never heard of any place named Arland
even outside the Bressisle Island...
Sterk

The Bressisle Island? Um, it's a strange name to me.
I came here all of a moment...
Anis Hyssop

Huh? You mean... Sterk! Did you see
any space-time distortion the moment you came here?
Sterk

Distortion... Yeah. I remember there were things
like whirlpools around me.
Anis Hyssop

Sure enough... I'm afraid that's a space-time distortion.
So Sterk came from another world...
Peppermint

Sterk is from another world!? Maybe the
space-time distortion is created by that dragon too...
Sterk

Another world? Dragon?
Sorry, could you please tell me in detail?
Peppermint
Ah, yeah! Here is the thing...
Sterk

I see. I think Bressisle is threatened by the dragon now...
Right?
Peppermint
Yeah... Well, sorry to have dragged you into this...
Sterk

No, you don't have to apologize.
The problem is that dragon.
Sterk

Really...
Anyway, let's deal with that dragon first.
Sorel

Er... Sterk?
Are you going to join us!?
Sterk

Yeah. I can't turn a blind eye to this as a knight.
Even though this is not Arland.
Cresson

Oh, such noble chivalry! Sterk...
You're literally a good example of knights, ahhh!!
Anis Hyssop

Haha... We've seen Sterk's power,
so it's such a relief that you'd give us a hand!
Nice to work with you!
It's a bit terrifying, but nice to work with you!
Sterk

Yeah, same here. Please introduce this world to me
so that I can figure out the situation here.
Peppermint

Yeah, you look fierce... Hey!
How could you be this rude, [px]!?
Sorel
Come on, it's you who said he looks fierce, OK!?
Sterk
I can't believe I look fierce in this world...
Sterk

Anyway, it's not safe to be here.
Is there anywhere that we could sit down and talk...
Peppermint

Oh, yeah! Let's go back to the Academy first!
